resources.string: Block ads with a modified hosts file. Turn off to use third party solutions or if apps cause issues.
Enable or disable battery light while on DND, low battery
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Spoof your device as Pixel XL for Google Photos app only to provide unlimited storage for backup
Spoof your device as a different model for specific games to unlock higher FPS
Display notification when changing alert slider position
Show heads up only for dialer, messaging and alarm app
Double tap power button (slower single tap response), Disables double power tap for camera.
Jump to camera gesture is now disabled
Activate the torch by long pressing the power button while the display is off
Double-tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double-tap status bar to put the device to sleep
Double-tap to wake when device is dreaming
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Launch music app on headset connection
Launch the default music app when headset is connected
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Display an indicator next to signal icon when data is disabled
Hide VoLTE when VoWiFi is available
View or change power menu entries
Disable power menu on lock screen
This will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Pulldown status bar from right side
Pulldown status bar from left side
Always show quick settings on status bar pull down
The following QS tiles require unlocking before you can acccess them from lock screen:\nAirplane, Cellular, NFC, Hotspot, USB tethering and Location
Use app icons for notification icons in statusbar
Display the number of pending notifications
Use old style mobile data icons
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Display seconds next to clock in status bar
Hide clock if launcher is visible
Number of seconds to hide clock
Number of seconds to wait before hiding clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Display clock in quick status bar header
Display date in quick status bar header
Always display battery percentage when charging
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
Display and customize battery bar above status bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Show ripple effect on unlock with fingerprint
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Set to empty for default Spark
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Display the app\'s icon corresponding with the toast
A half press will keep the screen on only while the button is held down
A longpress and release will launch camera
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Customize the layout of the navigation bar
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing
These settings mainly relate to the 3-button navigation bar. If you use gesture navigation and want to customize it, e.g. hide the gesture handle, please visit: Settings > System > Gestures.
Button backlight brightness will adjust based on current screen brightness level
Button backlight will only appear when buttons are pressed rather than on all the time. Timeout still impacts this feature.
Enable on-screen navigation bar and disable hardware buttons
Swap the order of recents and back buttons
Display media cover art when available
Hide QS in secure lock screen
Hides QS if device is locked. Does not disable notification shade
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
Shows temperature, charging current and more while plugged in
When entirely silent (no ringer or vibrator)
Whether to flash when in Do Not Disturb mode
Display a custom logo on left or right of the status bar
Enable custom UDFPS Icon from files
Select custom image from your saved files or gallery
Choose your favorite udfps pressed color
Replace your notifications with a redesigned version of tickers. \nSlim and less invasive than a standard notification
Use an alternative layout for reticker that is inspired from ios
Use a different animation for reticker (enabled by default on alternative reTicker)
Replace reTicker background color using notification app main color
Vibrate on reaching edges when scrolling with fling gesture
Blur amount for lockscreen media artwork
Light ambient edges for pulsing notifications
Keep showing edge lighting on AOD
Hide AOD content when edges are lighted
Time it takes for each animation to complete
Amount of times the animation should show\n0 for infinite
Show lights for all doze events and not just notifications
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Haptic feedback when adjusting brightness (Requires touch feedback to be enabled)
Replace clear all notification text with floating button
Use an alternative layout for the header in the sub-menus of Settings
Use stock aosp layout for the header in the main menu of Settings
Toggle in order not to show the usercard on main menu of Settings

This removes the screenshots and screenrecords limits for all applications. Normally, special applications are replaced with black areas in records. This can be convenient in some cases but may lead to privacy leaks. After changing this toggle, you may need to restart applications for the change to take effect.
Each battery level drop is color coded
Choose how transparent you want your qs to be (Requires SystemUI Restart)

Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see improvement in battery life. Note that in some cases it can result in unresponsive areas on touch screen
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Show Wi-Fi type in Wi-Fi signal indicator
Show label below icon instead next to icon
Reboot after selecting a font to take effect
Unable to find a suitable activity to perform this action!
Font file does not have valid postscript table
Failed to copy font to cache
Shows current network traffic speed in statusbar. The monitor shows the speed dynamically such that it alternates between upload and download speed each second
Network traffic rate text scale factor
Choosen color: %1$s. Set an empty value to use wallpaper color.
Custom charging symbol for text style
Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text
Blur media media notification artwork background
Blur amount for media notification artwork
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer when music plays on the device
Audio graphic equalizer for navigation bar and lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Audio graphic equalizer on the lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the ambient screen
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Set the visualizer in center mirrored mode
Create other pulse and flip vertically
Display battery status for the connected bluetooth device, if available
Show System Info icon on Qs
Show indicator when any app uses mic or camera
Show indicator when any app uses location
Show indicator when device screen is projected
Display a dialog with data usage details on expanded qs panel
Use custom color instead of wallpaper accent
Show a Animation when show AoD
Show headers in the notification shade
Enable combined signal icons\n(WARNING: a soft reboot will occur upon enabling combined signal icons)
Show lyric in status bar (need app support)
Disguise device in some music applications for support status bar lyric. After changing this toggle, you have to restart applications for the change to take effect.
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Setup icon pack and weather service
Display current weather condition and temperature
Requires weather service to be enabled
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Show temp with scale,image and weather condition
Setup icon pack and weather service
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"

Tips: 

1. Users can install new icon packs from play store by searching for "Chronus icons".

2. Condition icon pack is used for weather icons on quick settings and sushi launcher at a glance.

3. Long press the QuickSettings weather view/logo/temperature to access weather settings with ease.
Hide media panel squiggle animation, after changing you need to switch music, pause music or move the progress bar to apply
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Enforce chosen shortcut to be the only existing priority\nWill show nothing until the specific chosen shortcut is available
Optimize device power consumption and performance while device is idle
Boost system resources for a fluid experience
Disable Wi-Fi on screen off when Spark aggressive idle mode is enabled
Disable Bluetooth on screen off when Spark aggressive idle mode is enabled
Disable Mobile data on screen off when Spark aggressive idle mode is enabled
Disable Location on screen off when Spark aggressive idle mode is enabled
Max. notification icons visible on statusbar
Show daily cellular/Wi-Fi data usage in QS footer
